user_question: Which universities offer courses in astrobiology, and can you generate an image of a futuristic university campus?
final_answer: Universities offering courses in astrobiology include Harvard University, University of Arizona, and University of Washington. Image of a futuristic university campus generated. The University of Arizona has the most research funding for astrobiology.
